org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider

Class XMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider.ProviderSupport
      • org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider.MessageBodyReaderSupport<java.util.Map>
        • org.grails.plugins.jaxrs.provider.XMLReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    grails.core.support.GrailsApplicationAware, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader<java.util.Map>, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware

    @Provider
public class XMLReader
extends MessageBodyReaderSupport<java.util.Map>
implements grails.core.support.GrailsApplicationAware
    A message body reader that converts an XML entity stream to a map than can be used to construct Grails domain objects. Any JAX-RS resource method that defines a Map as parameter and consumes either text/xml or application/xml will be passed a map created from an XML request entity: 

     @Path('/notes')
 @Produces('text/xml')
 class NotesResource {

      @POST
      @Consumes('text/xml')
      Response addNote(Map properties) {
          // create ne Note domain object
          def note = new Note(properties).save()
      }

 }
